title: How to Make Cream of Chicken Soup With No Vegetables

steps.headline: Melt butter in a large saucepan.
Cook mixture until smooth but not browned.
Add milk, half-and-half and chicken broth.
Add dash of pepper to taste, white pepper preferred

text: Melt butter in a large saucepan.  Whisk flour into melted butter.  Cook mixture until smooth but not browned.  Add milk, half-and-half and chicken broth.  Whisk mixture until blended.  Cook mixture until slightly thickened.  Reduce heat.  Add cooked chicken.  Add dash of pepper to taste, white pepper preferred  Heat until almost steaming.  Serves 4.
